name: Dale Curtis Communications
description:
At Dale Curtis Communications, we help companies and causes advance their agendas through smart, strategic, integrated public relations in Washington, DC and beyond. Launched in 2009, Dale Curtis Communications provides public relations and content services to corporate and nonprofit clients who need expert help in honing their messages, gaining positive visibility and advancing their agendas, particularly in the public affairs sphere.
We provide a full range of services, including strategic counsel, messaging and materials, creative, digital media, media relations, event management and partnerships. We serve companies, associations, nonprofits, and government in many different sectors, including technology, defense and security, telecoms, energy and environment, education, and global affairs.
